name: claudify
description: MCP connector for Claude IA (from Perplexity). The app can interact between Claude IA and Spotify by using Oauth2 with local server.

scripts.cleanup: node -e "const mgr = new (require('./secure-credentials').SecureCredentialsManager)(); console.log('Nettoyés:', mgr.cleanupExpiredCredentials()); mgr.close();"
scripts.backup: node -e "const mgr = new (require('./secure-credentials').SecureCredentialsManager)(); const path = './backup-' + new Date().toISOString().replace(/[:.]/g, '-') + '.db'; mgr.backup(path); console.log('Sauvegarde créée:', path); mgr.close();"
scripts.reset-db: node -e "const fs = require('fs'); const mgr = new (require('./secure-credentials').SecureCredentialsManager)(); const dbPath = mgr.dbPath; mgr.close(); if(fs.existsSync(dbPath)) { fs.unlinkSync(dbPath); console.log('Base de données supprimée:', dbPath); } else { console.log('Aucune base à supprimer'); }"
